abstract: Profile of Detroit Tigers third baseman Brandon Inge, key to team's postseason success; Inge is enjoying resurgence after recent stint in the minors.
snippet: Brandon Inge did not quit when he was sent to the minors; now he is hitting .333 in the postseason.
lead_paragraph: Brandon Inge did not quit when he was sent to the minors; now he is hitting .333 in the postseason.

headline.main: In Year 11 as a Tiger, Finding Life After Toledo
headline.print_headline: In Year 11 as a Tiger, Inge Finds Life After Toledo
headline.seo: In Year 11 as a Tiger, Inge Finds Life After Toledo
